item.title: Renaming of military bases stirs debate over Confederate ties
item.description: More than half a dozen Army bases’ names were changed in 2023 because they honored Confederate leaders

item.title: Here's how a major Mexican tomato exporter is affected by Trump’s 17% tariff
item.description: The Trump administration's 17% duty on fresh tomatoes imported from Mexico is creating challenges for the country that supplies the most tomatoes to U...

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Saturday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Saturday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 08-31-57-65-67, Powerball: 23

item.title: People stabbed at a Walmart in Michigan; suspect is in custody
item.description: Michigan State Police says local sheriff’s office is investigating the incident.

item.title: Landlord jailed for decades in hate-crime attack on Palestinian American family has died
item.description: A landlord who was jailed for decades after he attacked a Palestinian American boy and his mother has died
